name: obsidian-calendar-view
description: Add a visual, interactive calendar to your notes â€” with daily thumbnails for any file that references that date.

scripts.build: npm run scss && npm run tsc && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.dist: npm run build && (if not exist dist mkdir dist) && copy /Y main.js dist && copy /Y manifest.json dist && copy /Y styles.css dist
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
